    Aracnia looked to Quickstrike to answer his question when she heard 
Tarantulas scream. "What is it, whats wrong?"
    "The Aliens! There...there....there coming here! There sending an 
automated warship called the Armada! Its programmed to destroy any 
intelligent life, that means us!" He screamed.
    She felt dread sweep over her body. "Warship? Automated?" She stammered.
    "Yes! Apprently this was a outpost to begin colonization and then the 
beast wars started. Then it became an observation post until an earthquake 
destroyed the bunker and killed the aliens. If anything happned the warship 
would come to obliterate us so they could colonize the planet!" Tarantulas 
screamed.
    "That means that we have only...."
    "Only a few days before the Armada arrives and destroys us all! I suggest 
we do something!!!!" He hissed.
    Aracnia, for the first time in her rulership felt utterly incompetent. 
She turned to Quickstrike, who, for some reason, she felt was the only person 
whou could help her right now.
